00009 #if !defined(Apoxi_AtManager_hpp)
00010 #define Apoxi_AtManager_hpp
00013 
00014 #if defined(APOXI_ENABLE_GENERIC_AT_INTERFACE)
00015 
00016 /*  AtManager is able to receive incoming command strings sent via AT. It will 
00017     only exist once so it cannot be initialized a second time. If one aims to 
00018     listen to a command string it has to register for it. The concept allows 
00019     the OnAtCommand() method to be overridden. As a result the deriving object 
00020     can handle forwarded AT command strings on its own. */
00021 class AtManager {
00022 
00023     public:
00024 
00026         BOOLEAN Init(AtManager * obj);
00028         BOOLEAN IsInitialized();
00030         void Reset();
00031 
00033         BOOLEAN RegisterAtCommand(const String& str, const INT timeout = 0);
00035         BOOLEAN UnregisterAtCommand(const String& str);
00038         BOOLEAN SplitAtCommand(const String& str, const String& token, 
00039             String& cmd_str, String& arg_str);
00041         BOOLEAN SendAtResponse(const String& str, const BOOLEAN final = TRUE);
00042         
00044         void SetReceiveAccessoryCommandEnabled(const BOOLEAN enable);
00046         BOOLEAN IsAccessoryRegistrationEnabled();
00048         void SendAccessoryRegistrationResponse(const AtStatusType status, 
00049             const BOOLEAN enable);
00051         BOOLEAN SendAccessoryCommand(const String& acc_str);
00052 
00053     protected:
00054 
00056         virtual BOOLEAN OnAtCommand(const String& str);
00058         virtual BOOLEAN OnAccessoryRegistrationRequest(const BOOLEAN enable);
00059 
00060     private:
00061         
00063         static BOOLEAN WrapAtCommand(const String& str);
00065         static BOOLEAN WrapAccessoryRegistrationRequest(const BOOLEAN enable);
00067         static AtManager * m_registered_manager;
00068 
00069 };
00070 
00071 #endif  // APOXI_ENABLE_GENERIC_AT_INTERFACE
00072 
00074 #endif  // Apoxi_AtManager_hpp
